name: PIPO'S ON THE RUN
description:
[Jogo disponível em Português-BR]

The leaderboard may not work in the web version. Download the game for the best experience.

Pipo's on the Run is about a cat endlessly running through roofs. Jump on chimneys and avoid weather vanes in this cute pixel art game!

This is a game inspired by my girlfriend's cat Pipo.

If you like the game, consider donating! It will help me buy the license to publish in Google Play. Allowing me to release this game and many future ones I develop!

Mobile: Tap on the screen to jump
PC: Space bar to jump

A big thanks to Jordan Durant, the one behind the sound design. To João Dias (@musicbycamo), who's composed a beautiful song. And to Kourtney Lowman(@kodelo_kunst), who played the flute alongside João. 

And thank you for playing the game.

[Clique aqui para dar feedback ou reportar um bug.]
